page.title: 08Sheen Tug o' war Club
page.content: The Sheen Tug o' war club has been in existence for about 20 years. They have won a lot of tournaments. In their best year they won over 100 cups and shields and had over 20 members. They have had four teams at different weights with eight pullers in each team, some club members pulling in more than one team. They won the World Championship and in doing so they have been to many countries including Ireland, Scotland, Wales, Holland, Belgium, Australia, America, Italy, Germany, Isle of Man, Isle of White, Austria, Yugoslavia, New Zealand, South Africa and Jersey. The club secretary is Mr. John Critchlow of Manor Farm, Sheen, who also acts as coach and manager and is a founder member of the club along with his brothers and some of his cousins.
